title: How do I store photos and videos to the microSD card by default?
answer:
For EMUI 2.3, enter the camera viewfinder mode and select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123273). Select the Others tab and set the Preferred save location to SD card. 

 For EMUI 3.0, enter the camera viewfinder mode and select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123274). Select Settings and set the Preferred save location to SD card. 

 For some phone models, photos and videos will be saved by default to the microSD card when a microSD card is inserted. You do not need to manually configure these models.
keywords: photos, recordings, videos, save, microSD card
